scssFormatter.description: A Visual Studio Code Extension to format SCSS
scssFormatter.commands.showOutput.title: Show Output
scssFormatter.commands.clearOutput.title: Clear Output
scssFormatter.config.printWidth.descript: Specify the line length that the formatter will wrap on
scssFormatter.config.singleQuote.descrip: Use single quotes instead of double quotes
scssFormatter.config.trailingComma.descr: Print trailing commas wherever possible when multi-line
